title: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? OVA (Dub)
alternative_title: Is This a Zombie? OVA, これはゾンビですか? OVA
description: OVA released with the 8th and 10th volumes of the original novel. They fall chronologically between the first and second seasons.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Ecchi>, <Genre -> Harem>, <Genre -> Magic>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
